sentences.sContent: A: He got the scholarship to Harvard.
sentences.sContent_eng: A: He got the scholarship to Harvard.
sentences.sCn: 他得到了哈佛大学的奖学金。

sentences.sContent: "I want to find these stars because I want to look back in time," says Frebel, now at the Harvard-Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I want to find these stars because I want to look back in time," says Frebel, now at the Harvard-Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics.
sentences.sCn: “我想找到这些恒星，因为我想回顾过去。” 弗雷贝尔说。 现在，她在哈佛大学-史密森天体物理中心工作。

sentences.sContent: I have no doubt he will serve Harvard with the same passion.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have no doubt he will serve Harvard with the same passion.
sentences.sCn: 毫无疑问，他会以同样的热情去为哈佛大学服务。
